sep.gaia.resources.poi

Class POIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.ResourceObservable<R>
      • sep.gaia.resources.DataResourceManager<PointOfInterest>
        • sep.gaia.resources.poi.POIManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoaderEventListener<PointOfInterest>, StateObserver

    public class POIManager
extends DataResourceManager<PointOfInterest>
implements LoaderEventListener<PointOfInterest>
    Manages PointOfInterest-objects using appropriate major- and sub-categories. Instances of this class observe the GeoState-object and request new data if necessary.
    Author:
    Matthias Fisch (specification/implementation)

        public void requestLoaderStop()

        Specified by:

      • onResourcesAvailable

        public void onResourcesAvailable(java.util.Collection<PointOfInterest> resources)
        Description copied from interface: LoaderEventListener
        Will be called if the loader the implementation of this listener is assigned to, has partially processed a query.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • setSubCategoryActive

        public boolean setSubCategoryActive(SubCategory subCategory,
                           boolean active)
        Sets a sub-category managed to a certain state of activation.
        Parameters:
        subCategory - The sub-category to set.
        active - Whether the sub-category should be set activated or not.
        Returns:
        true if the entry was found and set appropriate or false if the sub-category is not managed.
